Desription: Dialogue that will appear in the story mode version of Astral projectiles

Dialogue: Pilot: Year is 1989, December 12th. Time is 1 PM.
Pilot: Surrounded by unknown objects, UFOs.
Commander: Yep, I hear you. Careful, Don't know why they're not shooting but their hulls pack a punch.
Pilot: Yeah, I already got some damage on the rear.
Commander: Pilot, I'm losing contact with you. It's all static.
Pilot: Commander? Hello? What do you mean?
